post.text:
The ongoing debate over the #NEP's three language-policy has once again put the #BJP-led central government and the #DMK-led #TamilNadu government at odds. 

Adding to the row, the Tamil Nadu government has replaced the Rupee symbol "₹" with the #Tamil script "ரூ" in the logo for the state's 2025-26 budget.

READ: 
toi.in/LBAAyZ
